title: Exit Wound
description: A physical extraction attempt targets a prototype chip with standardized exit hardware.

scenes.narrative: The extraction team is attempting to remove the chip from a research facility. Security systems are being bypassed systematically.

choices.label: Position team members to intercept at key checkpoints.
choices.consequence: Strategic positioning allows you to observe the extraction method.

choices.label: Predict extraction routes based on facility layout.
choices.consequence: You anticipate the team's path and set up interception points.

choices.label: Deploy automated security countermeasures.
choices.consequence: Automated systems slow the extraction team and provide tracking data.

choices.label: The exit hardware looks standardized - check other sites.
choices.consequence: You find the same exit hardware used in unrelated security breaches.

scenes.narrative: The extraction team has reached the perimeter. The chip is in a secure transport case.

choices.label: Negotiate surrender to avoid damage to the chip.
choices.consequence: The team surrenders peacefully, preserving the prototype intact.

choices.label: Calculate interception points for minimal risk.
choices.consequence: Precise interception prevents the extraction without endangering the chip.

choices.label: Use non-lethal countermeasures to disable the team.
choices.consequence: Countermeasures disable the extraction team while securing the chip.

choices.label: The transport case is a decoy - the real chip is elsewhere.
choices.consequence: You discover the chip was already extracted through a different method.
